  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM       http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:openlearn.open.ac.uk:E801_3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>LearningSpace</catalog>
            <entry>E801_3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en-gb">Curriculum framework in Scotland</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lehrplanrahmen in Schottland</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cadre de programme d'études en Ecosse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estrutura do curriculum em Scotland</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Struttura di programma di studi in Scozia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πλαίσιο προγράμματος σπουδών στη Σκωτία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Marco del plan de estudios en Escocia</string>
          </title>
          <language>en-gb</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en-gb">In this unit you will find a discussion of the national curricula framework in Scotland. This is discussed in terms of the literacy curricula, and compared to the framework set up in England and Wales.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Education</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">literacy_development</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">national_curricula_frameworks</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">special_needs_education</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>linear</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>2</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Maßeinheit finden Sie eine Diskussion 
über den nationalen Lehrplanrahmen in Schottland. Dieses wird 
in den Bildungsgradlehrplänen ausgedrückt behandelt und verglichen 
mit dem Rahmen, der oben in England und in Wales eingestellt wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cette unité vous trouverez une discussion du
cadre national de programmes d'études en Ecosse. Ceci est 
discuté en termes de programmes d'études d'instruction, et comparé 
au cadre installé en Angleterre et au Pays de Gales.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta unidade você encontrará uma discussão da 
estrutura nacional dos curricula em Scotland. Isto é discutido 
nos termos dos curricula do literacy, e comparado à estrutura 
ajustada acima em Inglaterra e em wales.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa unità troverete una discussione sulla 
struttura nazionale di programmi di studi in Scozia. Ciò è 
discussa in termini di programmi di studi di literacy ed è 
confrontata alla struttura installata in Inghilterra e nel Galles.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτήν την μονάδα θα βρείτε μια συζήτηση του 
εθνικού πλαισίου προγραμμάτων σπουδών στη Σκωτία. Αυτό 
συζητείται από την άποψη των προγραμμάτων σπουδών βασικής 
εκπαίδευσης, και συγκρίνεται με το πλαίσιο που οργανώνεται στην 
Αγγλία και την Ουαλία.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En esta unidad usted encontrará una discusión 
del marco nacional de los planes de estudios en Escocia. Esto se
discute en los términos de los planes de estudios de la instrucción,
y se compara al marco fijado para arriba en Inglaterra y País de 
Gales.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ausbildung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">literacy_development</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">national_curricula_frameworks</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">special_needs_education</string>
          </keyword>
